channel.title: [562] How to add Donator icon?
channel.description:
How am I able to add a donator Icon like this [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/30kd3eh.jpg[/img] next to a persons name ingame? I want it to look something like this:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/smtxeg.png[/img]
But instead of the crowns, the donator icon.
